title: Help Is On The Way
description: Waiting for help is never easy, but as Lake Norman Campus Pastor Chad Hampton teaches us, how we wait can make all the difference. To support this ministry and help us continue to reach people all around the world click here: http://ele.vc/TI55jR
dc:creator: Elevation Church
